title: Is there a cut off time for booking the tickets? : BookMyShow Support Centre
category: Ticket Booking Queries : BookMyShow Support Centre
body:
Online booking is ideally available 1 hour to 15 minutes prior to the showtime and it varies from cinema to cinema.
Certain cinema do allow last minutes booking too :)
P.S: Cinema can stop the online booking before the cut off time since they reserve the seats for offline bookings.
